string-array.name: other_join_room_msg
string-array.item: Tips:Some players may freeze when entering the game. If it happens, please wait for the screen to get back to normal.
Tips:Login can reduce the possibility of being kicked out. Do you want to log in?
Tips:The Internet connection of the host may also cause lag on your side.
Tips:After youâ€™ve created a server, please enter the game at once.
